website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, comfortable bed that cats can't get enough of and fits the decor of most rooms.
pros: Entryway is firm and structured, making it easy to walk in and out of
Soft, plush mattress is removable and easy to wash
Bed can fit a 9-pound cat with room to spare
Available in a number of neutral colors
cons: Bed arrives vacuum sealed and it takes a while for the wrinkles to smooth out

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed. He's extremely shy and I originally got it for him to hide in as he was transported by car across the USA. He's been in it every night for four months progressing from hiding totally under the pad to having one paw hanging out of the opening while he enjoys the view.
customer_reviews.author: tmtay308

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Cat-Nap Nook. She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cozy bed. It took a day or so for her to try it out, and now she uses it every day. It's well made, looks nice and provides some insulation on cooler days, especially when I lay a little blanket across the top. I bought the sage color and am happy with it, note that it is lighter than the picture. I've tried a few other cat beds with hoods, and this is the one my girl loves. She can easily jump into the large opening, the top stays up, and there's plenty of room for her (9 pounds) to move around. I'm so glad to find a cozy nap nook she loves!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap.  Awful cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design. I would happily pay much more for this design made with quality material. But this is very cheaply made with thin flimsy cheap materials. The cushion is a joke - it doesn’t lie flat or fully cover the inside floor. So lumpy and uncomfortable that my cats prefer to lie on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Poor return policy
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews. But this cat bed has a very small opening. I read all the reviews and ordered it according to the size of my cat. My cat is a year old about 9 Pounds. But opening for the pet is too small. But in order to return it Aeromark wants me to jump through all kinds of hoops, from photos of the shipping box and the bed to measurement of the opening of the bed. Then they want to charge all kinds of return and restocking fees. Lesson learned don't order from this company or any other 3 party company. It's not worth the hassle if you're not satisfied with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Lessia Tate

customer_reviews.title: Cushion did not hold up in the wash
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the best kitty hut I've every purchased in terms of size, softness, design, and durability. The problem is only the cushion that comes with it. I put them both in the washing machine on my standard laundry settings (not gentle for delicates) and the cushion literally disintegrated into a mass of tattered fabric and stuffing was everywhere. What a mess! But the housing came out of the wash in perfect condition, soft and clean, and kept its shape. I have washed it again since and it still looks as good as new. I have replaced that cushion with a folded bath towel which is a satisfactory replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lawren Freebody

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves her bed. This is actually the second one I've purchased. Once I saw how much she loved the first, I had to get her another for my bedroom. For reference she's a Maine Coon mix and approximately 13 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up !
customer_reviews.text: So, anyone that has a cat knows that when you buy them something, they either love it or despise it. Luckily, my cat LOVES it. It's one of the best things I ever got him. He loves to sit in it and watch the fire in the wood stove, and cuddle up. Since he's a rescue, found on the streets, I think he likes being able to hide in there. I was also worried that he wouldn't fit in it because he's big --14 lbs of love. But he fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beds vacuum packed for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought other Armarkat products in the past (pet stairs and other cat huts), but unfortunately these huts are vacuum packed in plastic and put in boxes for shp. They do not return to a upright shape even when out of the plastic for a reasonable length of time. The quality appears great & I’ve washed similar beds in the past, but these look like they’ll collapse even more with use. 🙀 I’m very dissatisfied and disappointed. I was gonna give one a a gift, but it looks cheap. I returned the beds.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Cat tends to like this, but as she is older and fully ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat tends to like this, but as she is older and fully grown she has a bit of difficulty getting into it. She will mostly only go in it when she wants to do her morning admiration of my head while I'm sleeping next to it. I actually purchased a litter box around the same time as this. The cat absolutely preferred 'nesting' in the litter box when I left it out for her to explore before filling it with litter. This is overall a good design that seems comy for the cat, and I like the depth on it, but it needs to be wider and taller.
customer_reviews.author: Mirrorsaw

customer_reviews.title: I recommended it to a friend who got one for her ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kitten who was growing out of her "baby basket"! She loves this bed. I recommended it to a friend who got one for her cat, as well. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats, one loves to go under covers and being enclosed. We've had two other open beds for him, which over time he's managed to trash. I put this one out and he took to it immediately, even choosing it over the previous open bed. My cat is lightweight (~7 pounds) but long, he fits well in this bed. I don't know what shade of green "Laurel" is supposed to be, but this is basically sage green which works well for us. I haven't washed it yet so can't provide feedback on how well it holds up for washing. Will update once we wash it. Less 1 star for the pillow, which could use more padding.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Cats: 10/10 Would Sleep Again
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to ask my cats how they felt about this bed however they would not wake up long enough to provide a comment. From my perspective, this is the first purchased cat bed that they've ever taken to immediately despite it being placed in a relatively exposed location. The enclosed nature of the bed helps the cats feel secure and isolated, which are important for their comfort levels, which lead to their immediate use of the unit. All three of my cats will use this bed, and it seems to keep the warmth in which helps in colder climates. Would definitely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Limetiger

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat just absolutely LOVES this bed. I put it on one of the shelves of the cat tree and she loves to climb in there when she is cold. It keeps her nice and warm and hidden away. She can also peek out to see what is going on. It washes very well using the delicate cycle and very low dryer cycle. I only have had to wash it once after another cat (a stray I was trying to acclimate to the house for winter) got in it. After that my cat wouldn't go in the bed until I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in washing machine
customer_reviews.text: When I removed the pillow and washed it in the washing machine, it came apart. I took me an hour to clean up the mess - little pieces of polyester in my washer and dryer. A week later I still find little pieces all over the apartment. What’s the point of a cat bed if it isn’t machine washable?
customer_reviews.author: D. U. Cahn

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I've wasted so much money on cat beds my cat won't go near so I was hesitant about purchasing this one but decided to anyway since my cat likes enclosed spaces. As soon as I unpacked it and set it up, she was in it. It's now once of her favorite spots to lay in/nap so I would say it was definitely worth the money. She also likes to occasionally attack it, for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: My Human bought me this great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Binxz the Cat here. I love my new bed. (It will be my winter bed because it is so warm and snuggly.) I took to it right away. Just the right size and furry soft too. I deserve nothing less. I am a black cat and you can't see me in a dark room. That makes me laugh but I have to be careful. My human will trip on me. He is so clumsy. I digress. Anyhoo....buy this bed for your kitty. Tell them Binxz sent you. My brother Bailey is too fat to fit in this bed which is just fine with me. You will need something bigger for a portly, stout kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Teichen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it except...
customer_reviews.text: I and my cats love this bed. I had to get two extra because they would fight over the first one I ordered. My only complaint about the Indian Red bed is that the color is a good bit lighter than the one in the picture. I know, it could be monitor differences, except that the color is not red at all, but a definite mauve. Clashes wherever I put it. Overall though, this is the perfect cat bed - cozy, comfortable, durable, and easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat is in love with this bed. I was afraid my big 16 pound cat wouldn't fit but he does just fine. He can't stretch all the way so when he tries to half of his body just hangs out haha. It's super soft and if you remove the bottom there's a bit more room, but I don't see the point in removing the bottom. My cat had a problem with urinary crystals and at one point liked to pee on soft things. He even peed on his other bed but never dared ruin this one. Got this so he wouldn't be too cold during the winter. It holds heat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sarah jean

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality, and my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion was too soft for his taste, so I replaced it with a folded up bath towel. He sleeps in it every night, and loves it. I have put it through the clothes washer a few times, dried it without heat on "air fluff", and a year later it looks good as new. We put it on top of a bookcase that he can easily climb, and put a piece of hall carpet non-slip under it since it rests on a glossy painted shelf.
customer_reviews.author: S. Podell

customer_reviews.title: A waiting game but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed about 6 months ago and my cat just recently fell in love with it. I placed it several places before finally finding she liked it on top of her cat tree. Of course, right? It's a nice looking bed and is well-made. Just know that like most things it will take your cat time to decide if he\she deem it worthy. For those on the fence your cat is just as likely to find a dusty corner or cardboard box just as comfortable. If it's a money issue, I say save it. If you want something stylish that shows everyone that yes, you are a crazy cat person, I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beloved by the felines
customer_reviews.text: This snuggly bed looks like a loaf of bread, and each of our 6 cats took turns sleeping and just hanging out in the first two we ordered. They maintained their upright shape through entry gyrations and even a wrestling match. I haven't washed them yet, but it seems that a delicate cycle in the washer and air drying will do the job. The size is generous, and we have some unusually large cats; however, it was too small for our 23lb boy. Our 20 lb girl fit perfectly. We have now purchased one for every cat and one for each of my mother's cats. They get regular use in our large, drafty house.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: IT DEPENDS ON THE CAT
customer_reviews.text: MY SISTER BOUGHT ONE AND HER CAT LOVED IT AS SOON AS SHE TOOK IT OUT OF THE BOX. AND AFTER YEARS OF USE, SHE STILL LOVES IT. SO I ORDERED 2 AND MY CATS HATE IT. THEY NEVER EVEN ATTEMPTED TO GO IN IT AND WALK RIGHT BY IT WITH THEIR LITTLE SNOOTY NOSES UP IN THE AIR. I EVEN PUTTING CATNIP INSIDE THE BED AND THEY STILL WOULDN'T GO NEAR IT. AND THEY LOVE CATNIP. I GUESS MY CATS ARE SNOOTIER THAN MOST. LOL. SO APPARENTLY IT DEPENDS ON THE CAT.
customer_reviews.author: CISSY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hit! I showed it to my girl and within an hour she had hopped into it all on her own and has been there ever since! It’s a very cute design, almost like a little “cat cave”, and the inside is very plush and fuzzy (just like a blanket we have that she loves) which is exactly what I was hoping for. Super fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: mccracken101

customer_reviews.title: My cat is picky
customer_reviews.text: We move across country with a penske truck and wanted to provide a comfortable place for kitty kitty to chill. We put cat nip in it. We associated petting with it. Being that she is a cat- we were unable to change her mind about it and she picked a pillow instead. The cat nip did clean out easily. It kept its shape after being shoved in a storage box. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: britbrat

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for an Old, Cold Kitty
customer_reviews.text: My old, cold kitty loves this bed. I had made her a bed out of a cardboard box with a homemade pillow inside it, but I thought this bed looked like it would be warmer for her. Plus, it was on sale for Christmas. Now, she spends her days in the cardboard box, her evenings in this bed, and her nights trying to sleep on my head, of course. The 18" x 13" x 13" (cave shape) fits a fairly large cat comfortably. I haven't had any problems with it collapsing like other reviewers said. I even draped a blanket over it and it's kept its shape. My elderly cat approves.
customer_reviews.author: M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is just so charming and perfect size for my cat, who has adopted us by moving into our garage. Can't bring her in the house because have 2 large dogs who doesn't think she's so sweet (except maybe to eat!). I recently bought a outdoor heating pad to put inside. I feel so much better knowing that she has this shelter for the coldest days of Iowa's weather. She was loving it before the heating pad, now it will be extra special comfort.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitty loves her cave!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves to borrow under my blankets when I'm sleeping or just hanging out on the couch. I decided to try this car bed out...since it's cave like. I wasn't sure she'd like it. And when I first got it and opened it for her, she wanted nothing to do with it. Two days later and she's in LOVE with it. If I can't find her, that's where she is. It did arrive flat in a box, but it fluffed back up to what it should be fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGingerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: Armarkat used to make this with sturdy walls that were nearly uncollapsable, and with a tough corduroy shell, shearling-like lining and zippered bottom for easy cleaning. Mine is still in great shape after several years of multiple cats rough housing (tumbling it across the floor while playing hide-and-seek) and snoozing in it. This modern version is much more flimsy with thinner walls, shell and fleece. In fact, I was shocked at the small box it arrived in - proof that it was far more compressible than its hearty predecessor. Nonetheless, it's been immediately accepted by my guys, at least for snoozing. It won't hold its shape for rough housing, but that's not its intended use, so four stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Tobler

customer_reviews.title: It's so warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Ten minutes after I opened the package my cat was inside the little bed, asleep. She obviously loves it. She's been there for a while now. I'm sure she will get a lot of use out of her new bed. It's very soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Raindays

customer_reviews.title: It's so soft....
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and the package and she immediately got in (it instead of the box it came in lol) and started grooming herself. She loves it!! The reason for 4 stars instead of 5: the walls are thin covered foam so, I will need to add a blanket in winter and the top won't "peak up" properly. I think its cuz of the way its sewn. But other than that, it's great for the price and she loves it!!!! Btw my cat is 13 lbs so she is kinda large and she fits perfect with room to sleep in laying position instead of balling up.
customer_reviews.author: CinNaRV

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 Cats Agree
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this bed as I wasn’t sure if any of my 3 cats would like it, so I purchased one to test it out. So far 2 of 3 cats have made themselves right at home inside it to nap within the first day. The product seems well built, it’s extremely soft (I wish there was a human sized one), and fits my large 15lb cats. Astro & Zuki give it 5 stars. I’m definitely going to have to purchase at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: WeatherFeather

customer_reviews.title: Kitty tested, kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed, particularly if she's cold and wants a warm place to sleep in winter. Once I get up in the morning and she doesn't have a human cat warmer to sleep on, she moves over to this thing and hangs out. It's durable and has held up for five years of frequent use. It's lost its shape a little bit, but otherwise looks good as new. It claims to be machine washable/dryable, but I'm skeptical it would survive, so I've never tried. I just spot clean/vacuum it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Security and comfort for a rescue cat
customer_reviews.text: Five days ago, I picked up my 4-year old rescue cat who had been abused and abandoned by evicted owners and their dogs. He is skin and bones and afraid of his own shadow. He preferred to hide behind the washer/dryer, or in closet corners in very uncomfortable positions... until I forced him into this bed just once. Now he loves it so much - it's where he leaps at the slightest sound. I hope he gets braver as he gets healthier and soon rarely needs the bed at all. But, for now, it seems this is the best thing he's ever had, and he's very brave and feels very secure inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! Yorkie approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this house! I bought this to bring with her to the vet when I boarded her because she loves her bigger one at the house so much. She likes to be really warm so she hides in this house and curls up in a tiny blanket to sleep while I watch tv or read. Material is very soft and cleans with a soft washcloth easily, inside cushion can be machine washed. Package arrive quickly and was as pictured on the site. Attached is a picture that the vet uploaded of my dog enjoying her stay in their Pet Resort in this house :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Love Armarkat Items!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I can say about this bed is that as soon as I took it out of the package and set it on the floor, my largest kitty walked up to it, stepped in, curled up and went to sleep for a pretty good long time! I will probably buy a couple more to put in other areas of my house, as I have multiple kitties. Armarkat products are wonderful - great quality and well-priced. I have many different Armarkat items in my home and am very pleased with all of them and will continue to purchase this brand of cat products.
customer_reviews.author: OkToGo

customer_reviews.title: I just wish the outside cats would go inside it to sleep and keep warm.
customer_reviews.text: This is really cozy. And as it is outside, I was easily able to tie it inside a plastic kitchen bag to keep rain out. It seems well made. I am trying to shelter one abandoned cat and her young feral friend, but so far they won't go inside, even with catnip in there. I can't bring them in. I am almost certain my rescued dog would try to kill them right now...maybe later they can come inside.
customer_reviews.author: Spud's PlaceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having to purchase another of these because even our cat that usually does not like beds, took over the first one. They have held up well, have used vacuum inside and have washed the pull out pillow a number of times, dried on low heat, took it out before too dry and shook it to save the original shape. Would purchase again and think they are a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Linderoth

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just as advertised. Cat loves it. No more whining, she sleeps in it and that's where you will find her any day, any time. She's 18 so she has some health issues but seemed to quiet down a LOT when I got this. Would recommend for mid sized cat. I also added a 4watt heater as we are in the Denver area and it gets cold
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: But I cannot give you one good reason why as they are pretty darn similar
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and so bought two beds - this one and the Amarkat Laurel Green Cat Bed (18x14x12). For some reason, BOTH cats took to this one (which is slightly smaller) and peed in the other. We are not amused. So woohoo for this one; poopoo for that one. But I cannot give you one good reason why as they are pretty darn similar. (btw, quality, size, and plushness is great)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: A good bed for kitties
customer_reviews.text: Great little bed for cats and (I would assume) small dogs. Very soft and cuddly. It's open enough for the little fellas to see what's going on around them, but enclosed enough that it holds warmth. The sides hold up well, and it retains its shape. I haven't had to clean it yet, so I don't know about that.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves it, so I love it too! He only went inside once before he squished it down and now sleeps on top (see picture)- but hey, he's happy and that's all I care about! He even prefers this one over the bed he was sent home in from the shelter (we thought he'd like the shelter bed since it smelled like him, but apparently not!) I got the Brown & Ivory 18" L X 13" W X 13" bed. It is a nicely made, super soft, and seems like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Calicoco

customer_reviews.title: My cat adores this
customer_reviews.text: I should not be the one rating this bed since my cat Sterling is the better judge. I can say this, however: When I took the bed out of the box and set it at the end of my own bed, Sterling crawled into it within an hour and has been using it for his four hour afternoon naps ever since. At night, he prefers to sleep at the top level of his cat-tree but during the daylight hours he much prefers the quiet, dark enclosure of the Amarkat Cat Bed.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: very roomy! easily, and cozily, fits a large 15lb cat, with "large frame"...both cats, immediately, (after ignoring beds, way cats do...their terms) got into beds, instead of fighting evening beginning, were "content" enough to stay in, through my evening time, and stayed through the night!!! highly recommmend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Billock

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy though not sure its for kittens..
customer_reviews.text: So far only the kittens use it, not the mama cat. They love their mini cave but since they also are trying to climb it on tbe outside, the "roof" does kinda go flat, so i need to adjust it to keep the "dome" up and to make sure that the opening is still there. I would say - add wires to the dome, so it stays that way and wont collapse even if a bunch of kittens try to test it as a climbing wall.
customer_reviews.author: OlenaKO

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks great in my bedroom, litho ugh the actual color is much lighter than the one in the image. The picture I took is its true color, and the one beside it is the crowd favorite from the same brand. Regardless, this bed is beloved of my cats. Their two favorite beds are this brand. It is very durable, standing up well to the antics of two playful kittens and two older cats that just want some alone time in their own personal cave. It will stand up well to washing needs, too. Somehow it maintains its form without sagging, which is great! This is a very good brand fully endorsed by my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. False advertising, restocking fee of 15%
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BED. There are other more affordable options, which are also easier to return if the bed does not match the descripton. I bought the 18''Lx24''Wx13''H bed. A bit of false advertising as the top does not hold its shape. If you try to return it, you jump through hoops. There is a restocking fee, and then they ask for a photo......
customer_reviews.author: Ian Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great for Calm Cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute bed. Easy to clean and is very soft. My cats loved it for a few days until another cat would jump on top of the bed and squish whoever was inside. It was very funny but the cats stopped using the bed because of it. I ended up donating the bed and will only buy open beds from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a stray cat that I have been taking care of for several months. She has been fine sleeping in the box with a blanket in it during the warm months but now that it is getting cold at night, I wanted her to have a bed that would help her stay warmer at night. She seems to like it and it stays dry on the enclosed porch.
customer_reviews.author: The Siamese Twins

customer_reviews.title: Cute for cats, not as great for active snugglers
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of them for my small dogs, who like to burrow into their beds and blankets. This bed isn’t quite sturdy enough to when they start trying to burrow, it will tip over backwards or sideways unless braced. Consequently, one won’t go in it at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: My dachshund loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This house looks lovely: warm and cozy. I bought it for 2 mini dachshunds. When we leave the house in winter, they get very cold and can not help themselves to put on coats and get under the blankets. One of the doxies absolutely loves it, the other one is still not sure on how to use it. I am sure he will when he would need it. Both of them can fit inside at the same time even though it gets crowdy, but they like it this way. When the 12 lb dachshund gets inside, she is absolutely comfortable and warm. Overall, I am happy with this house, will be probably buying a second one for the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Cave, Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cat cave. It's very tidy looking and comfortable inside. The size was as described. Unfortunately my cat is just a tad too large for this cave and would not go inside. There is a happy ending though. I gave the cat cave to the cat lady who gave me my cat. I know one of her cats will think it's a meow - the cat's meow. It's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: picky cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves crawling up under the blankets of the bed so I thought he may like this cat bed. He hasn't been one to use cat beds before unless they're heated. Well he crawled right in and is sleeping soundly. Can they make a human size version of this? Cat is 9-10 lbs for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: PuddleDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great for a larger cat!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a larger cat! I have a 19 lb Russian Blue (not fat, just a big boy) that I've had a hard time finding and enclosed sleeping space for...Normally he likes to burrow under the covers, but not so convenient when you're trying to sleep. I've ordered other cat beds, but they could only accommodate my smaller, more normal size cats of 12-14 lbs... Well made...Great price...Great color...and my cat loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love_to_shop

customer_reviews.title: well made, very thick pillow, cats love them, I love the nice color and stye
customer_reviews.text: my cats love these. I wanted two beds that match. The local store never had two of the same pattern. And the pattern they had are UGLY. Thse match my living room and look great. They are so well made and the pillow is nice and soft. The kitty's love to "hide" in them. Every night the head straight for their beds in the evening. Well, and most of the day too. Being a cat is hard work. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good quality great looking cat bed
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome!!! Our new kitten went from a cardboard box (her home for a few days) to this and she has rarely left it. She sprawls out every which way and loves how plush it is. The materials and stitching appear to be high quality. Too early to say how well it will hold up, but I expect it will last her quite a while. I got the Sage Green and it seems to go with nearly every type of decor... very neutral.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Pet hut
customer_reviews.text: I have put this within a doghouse for my strays so that they have a soft place to sleep out of the cold. Outside cats don't like to go into confined spaces and they prefer to sleep on top of it instead of inside it. I bought it for the softness inside!
customer_reviews.author: Cat lady

customer_reviews.title: It opens up nicely! My sweet 17 pound pug absolutely loves snuggling ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't be freaked out by its packaging.... vaccume sealed, paper thin!!! It opens up nicely! My sweet 17 pound pug absolutely loves snuggling up in this! It's a tight "turn around" to get herself adjusted but once she is in she loves it! I would highly recommend this for dogs as well as cats! Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEIR BEDS/HOMES
customer_reviews.text: MY TWO TABBIES, CHARLES & CAMILLA, LOVE THEIR BEDS/HOMES. I ONLY BOUGHT ONE AT FIRST TO SEE IF IT WOULD B ENJOYED OR REJECTED: IT WAS FOUGT OVER! SO THE SECOND ONE WAS ORDERED; NO MORE FIGHTING AND STRANGELY, THEY HAVEN'T CLAIMED ONE AS "THEIRS". WHICH EVER IS AVAILABLE AT THE TIME OF A MUCH NEEDED NAP, IS CHOSEN: I NEED TO TAKE A PIX OF THEM. I CANNOT IMAGINE A CAT WITHOUT THIS PARTICULAR CAT BED:!ORDER ONE TO MAKE YOUR CAT HAPPY - NOW! MAYBE SOME OTHER COLOR CHOICES WOULD B A GOOD THING! SALLY VEAUTA SALLY VEAUTA!
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Veauta

customer_reviews.title: Armarkat Sage Green Pet Bed
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I read some reviews that showed and stated they recieved their pet bed in a vacuumed bag and when opened it never gained its shape, well, not the case in my case, it actually after a day gained its shaped and my kittens love it and refuse to leave it, its a great product well made and obviously warm, no prblems with shipping and would recommend it to any pet lover.
customer_reviews.author: Erik J. Krieger

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a nice bed.. But...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my cat stopped sleeping in this bed, bummed out because it is very nice and I have it set up so that she doesn't stick her paw in places she shouldn't because it's kind of a cave. But cats will do what cats do. She's got 3 or 4 other places to sleep right now. But hasn't gone back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Meza

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, large, maintains shape. Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Maintains it shape. Very good quality and my kitten loves it. The first month i put catnip in it she got in once and then ignored it but then I put it on her favorite spot ad removed the blanket she loved sleeping on there. now she lovvvves it and prefers it to my lap even. I have the Laurel green 18in ch bed..its roomy..she's 8lbs and can stretch and turn around..it helps that the bad is flexible but retains its original shape after.
customer_reviews.author: Seagal

customer_reviews.title: My Stray Cat Luv'd this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the outdoor stray that lives on my porch. The second that I took this out of its packing my stray LUV'd it, immediately jumped in and only comes out when she has to potty or to eat. So glad I bought this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but the floor isn't insulated, so add another mat or something inside it
customer_reviews.text: I placed a heated kitty mat inside this and my cat LOVES it! The floor of this is not insulated or padded, so I would not recommend using it on a cold floor unless you add a heated mat like I did. The pillow included doesn't really fit snugly and it's just polyfill, and I could imagine a lot of cold seeping up around it if used on the floor. It's great for using on my bed, however. Now my kitty sleeps right next to my pillow in her cozy covered bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jules O'Guin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: Received today. My cat Instantly took to the bed and spent most of the afternoon in it. He is approximately 12+lbs and fits in bed comfortably. We are both very happy with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nila B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for a new kitten but he really hated being in it
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this for a new kitten but he really hated being in it. In fact most my cats tended to avoid it until one of the older ones decided to start using it. Usually she sleeps in little cubbies or closets so after found out she liked it enough even with it just in the corner we keep it in one of her usual spots. Sometimes I catch her little brother sleeping in it as well but he still tends to prefer to hide upstairs under the bed or in my closet. I really like that it's easy to clean, especially the time one of the other cats pee'd in it and someone once threw up in it.
customer_reviews.author: S. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Good for average size cats but heafty cats may not fit comfortably into it.
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable fit for fat kitties! My 20 pounder could barely get into it but she managed. It was pitiful but funny to see her stuffed in there with her tail sticking out of it. If you have an average size kitty (i imagine under 15lbs or so), this will make a good place for your cat to take a nap in.
customer_reviews.author: Island of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This cat bed is perfect! It was smashed in a bag when we received it, but it popped back up nicely. We have a smaller cat that likes to be higher up off the ground, and this bed fits nicely on 12-inch wide shelf. I highly recommend this product. Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these beds I've bought. I wanted to make things as convenient as possible for my aging cat, who loves them. Now I have one in the laundry room (for when he wants seclusion) and one in the living room (for when he wants to be near me).
customer_reviews.author: Denverite

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but plush and my kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are plush and the included pillow is nice and soft but this is not nearly as shaped as the pictures lead you to believe. It collapses. I will have to fix it so that it actually stays open. I will say my kitty loves it. I sat her in it after unboxing it and she immediately stretched out and went to sleep. If it had even a small amount of reinforcement for the shape it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Haun

customer_reviews.title: Horrific chemical odor to it
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell is so horrific no critter would get near this thing! Cat will never go in it with that odor! Airing it out now ... hope it dissipates or I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVED it but I was expecting it to be a little bigger since I bought almost the biggest size they had since my cat is really fat. It smelled weird at first but if you wash it or let your cat break it in the new smell goes away and now my cat really loves it! But it is a bit over priced but I still love it and I thought it was still worth it because as long as my cat uses it, it doesn't go to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chen

customer_reviews.title: Both cats love it, but one is too big to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Both cats love it, but one is too big to get in (though she'll still try - and end up with her front half in it and her butt hanging out). My more petite, average cat loves it because he feels like he's hiding. Very soft, holds body heat well and washes like a dream. It comes vacuum-packed flat, so when you open the bag, it resumes its normal shape, though ours ended up with a bit of a permanent dent in the top. Still looks fine (though a bit lopsided) and the cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Red Azalea

customer_reviews.title: Staying warm
customer_reviews.text: My Zoey jumped right in this bed when I put it down! She is 4 lbs and not much hair so she likes to be covered up but she kept getting out from under her cover in the night and couldn’t get back under. This solves the problem and keeps her warm!
customer_reviews.author: kaskas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kitty bed donated to Shelter in NY!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item and donated it to a kitty Shelter in NY. It was part of their wishlist of needed items on Amazon. It looks to be a beautiful bed and we hope it helps all the kitties that use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Krzyna-RaspetTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does it Come in Adult Human Size??
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed for our 10 lb chiweenie, Otis, for his birthday. He fits in it perfectly!! The bed is soft and cushy and the removable pillow is super lush. I wish I could get in there. My only issue - and it’s not that big of an issue for me - is it’s not really red. It’s sort of a mauvey / burnt orange (compare it to the dark red shade it’s in front of). Anyway, it’s awesome and for all I know, “Indian Red” isn’t really supposed to be red.
customer_reviews.author: j.z.t.

customer_reviews.title: A cat favorite, very well made. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 2 years. Well made. The pillow inside is thick, fluffy and supportive. It's been washed a number of times and still looks like new. The lining makes for a warm spot for luxurious cat naps. Absolutely Zippy the Cat's favorite spot in the entire house. Zippy is about 13 lbs and a good size (he's not fat, but he is tall and long). He fits in the bed very well. Zippy is a very happy, active cat. He loves racing around the house, playing with toys, etc. but when he really wants to chill out, or when it's time for a serious nap, this is where he heads.
customer_reviews.author: FS Says

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love this Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one bed initially because my home is cold in the winter months and one of my cats needs a warm place to snuggle (and sleep the day away) while I'm at work. The Armarkat bed was such a success that both cats want to sleep in it! My cats tolerate each other but, won't sleep in the bed together. SO, I purchased a second bed and now everyone is happy! Armarkat produces excellent products. I also purchased a 7' Armarkat cat tree and both cats love it. Thus far I've purchased 3 Armarkat products and would search for this brand in future shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great office for a cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat gets work done in here. At first he was a little reticent to confine himself to small, enclosed spaces (he's the one cat that hates cardboard boxes) but I put it in a high traffic spot and he went right to it. He typically sleeps in there well...the entire day. I refer to this "bed" as his office, since he's just putting the work in. #TheGrind. Although more often than not I catch him sleeping on the job... I think his boss is gonna have to talk about his lack of productivity at work; but this isn't the forum to be reviewing my employee.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Amato

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this for the sweet stray cat.
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I bought this cat shelter. I put it on my covered porch and today the sweet stray cat slept in it for hours and hours. I also bought the 13 by 13 shelter and the cat is tall and thin but fit in the house, curled around in a ball the way they like to sleep. The .temperature was pretty cold and windy today and he enjoyed being in the shelter. The opening is a good size, not overly large, so it keeps the wind out pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: eledavf  Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Armakat Quality stuffed into too small a box
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall bed, my cats are fighting over it.....but there is NO WAY the cover is EVER going to stand on its own. It was stuffed into a box that was way to small for the bed and as such the hard plastic piece that is suppose to provide the necessary stiffness was kinked in the middle and snapped on the over end...
customer_reviews.author: David Hill

customer_reviews.title: The Furkids Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my two large male cats as replacements for their old/dirty predecessors. I thought they might ignore them since, as we all know, cats don't like change. However, as soon as they saw them, they both made themselves comfortable inside and have completely ignored their old ones, which I have now tossed out. These beds are so soft and plush. The cushion inside is a nice touch and is probably one of the reasons my cats immediately accepted them. Also, they are attractive enough so you don't feel like you have to hide them out of the way. If your cats like being inside things like cardboard boxes, they will probably love these.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: loved his bed in winter & when he was injured ...
customer_reviews.text: We have feral cats in our neighborhood. One of them has been sleeping (& eating) on our back porch for more than a year. Peddy..who has 6 toes... loved his bed in winter & when he was injured he slept in it for 4 days. I am glad we could help him.
customer_reviews.author: Peddy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Have a chemical smell....😞
customer_reviews.text: Received today. The smell was absolutely horrible. It has a chemical smell. I did Not put my kitten in there. Its unfortunate because now I have to try washing it or dry cleaning it to see if the smell will go away and hopefully it does not ruin the shape. Its a great size ! Not sure what to do!!!! Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Onelove

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cat bed
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a very nice cat bed ... my Mom is waiting for her Manx kitten to get big enough to bring home... I’m sure she ( Feiona) will love it. It’s beautiful and soft just like a kitten would like
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: My small dogs like it very much
customer_reviews.text: My dog Buffy loves it. I placed it on the fireplace hearth. She went inside right away and spent a good hour curled up inside before leaving to go about her business doing whatever small dogs do to while away the time. I've ordered a second one for my other dog Xena who barked several times because she wanted to go inside the bed, but she couldn't because Buffy was already inside. I guess there's enough room for two small dogs, but apparently they don't want to share.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Heather Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but my cat is weird.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed, large enough in size for my 17 pound (muscular and tall not fat) cat. However, this was my third attempt to get him to enjoy a cat bed and he just doesn’t seem into it. He crawled in and lates in it for maybe 3 minutes and never used it again. Gave it to a friend who says their 2 cats love it though!
customer_reviews.author: RunMaine

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: This pet cave is okay, but I wish it was a little sturdier or structured. It caves in pretty easy. Otherwise, it's a good little hidey hole for a pet who needs some alone time. It's also pretty easy to clearn.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Tisron

customer_reviews.title: My small cat adores this. My 19 pounder tried ...
customer_reviews.text: My small cat adores this. My 19 pounder tried to go in it a few times but he'd fall over because it's too small for him....so he started sitting on the top of it, even when the smaller cat is in it. What can I say, Lurk just wants to watch the world burn ;) It's a very nice​ and soft little bed for a small to med sized cat.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl H

customer_reviews.title: Took to her new cozy bed right away!!
customer_reviews.text: My recently adopted 11 lb Maine Coon mix immediately took to her Armarkat Bed. She is long with a full tail and is comfortable in this size. I'm glad I went with the larger size. Smaller kitties can snuggle in the back and still have lots of privacy. Because it is shipped flat, it tends to collapse a little at the top. Just put your hand inside and push it out to reform the top. Now it's fine. I am certain she will practically live in it during the winter months. It is so soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: From the day that we got it, our 2 15lb cats have been sleeping in it. It is their favorite basket ever. The cover however is not working as intended. They do not crawl under it, but lay on top. If I put it on after they are in, soon one of them will lay on top. The top zips on and off easily and has a thin metal wire in it to give it some support to stay open, but not enough to stand up to the weight of a cat. The fabric feels nice and the pattern is ok. I would not call it bronze, just Gray
customer_reviews.author: M. Van Hoef

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled with this bed. It has a pretty design, pretty sage color, and is neither too large or too small in size. The top cover is sturdy and does not collapse! Best of all my puppy likes it’s cozy bottom and walls. It was exactly what I wanted and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Chaplin’s new bed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our feral cat to keep him warm. A heating pad underneath it on low in his favorite chair did the trick. He loves it- we love it. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynne Slivyak

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: I set the first one up to see if any of our cats would show interest, and within 15 minutes one of them was inside. Set up the second one and another cat was inside almost right away. They're very soft plush and look like they're very cozy. One of the cats who went inside is fairly large and she fit just fine. These are a total hit.
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Buddy got in and laid dow in in 2 minutes he's still in there
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, i just ordered a second one already. I have two cats and as soon as I set this on the floor and tossed a toy in, Buddy the cat stepped in, did a circle, and he's been lying in there for 30 minutes. An instant hit. Nicely constructed. The color is more accurately described as camel. We love it! UPDATE: I got plenty of use out of these but eventually the top of the house sagged and totally lost its shape. It looked bad before it actually wore out. I would not buy this again. I threw the two I bought out and am now online spending more money for replacements. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: Kat loves her new house.
customer_reviews.text: Kat is my outdoor cat. I setup her new house on the back porch. She immediately got in & checked it out. I know she loves it because that week she brought me two rats & a rabbit. Guess she wanted me to know how much she loves her new house. Great product & I highly recommend this house
customer_reviews.author: Thorin

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this bed. I wanted to get ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed. I wanted to get her a bed for my living room so she'd have her own space. She's a larger cat (14.5lbs) & fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Cat took to it when I sprinkled a bit of Cat Nip in it. Sleeps in it every day. Haven't washed it yet but would recommend hand washing or gentle cycle on washer for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Fernwood

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect sized cozy bed
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sized cozy bed. Our cat loves it. The only drawback is that the colors shown don't match what's delivered. The photo for Laurel Green looks like a dark green but it's actually a light sage. Same for the red one which I returned. It looks dark red in the photo but it's actually a pink/dusty rose color.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: This sweet little tent bed is perfect for a toy dog
customer_reviews.text: This sweet little tent bed is perfect for a toy dog, providing them with the security and comfort of a den - but portable! The plush fabric is so soft and easy to clean, the pillow inside has a plush side and a woolly fleece side - it removes for easy washing and the filling doesn't bunch up after it goes through the dryer. Incredible value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Packet RoeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My Guy Loves It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been through a number of cat beds. This one is the best by far. The guy who needs to write the review can't do it, so as his proxy I can say it is well constructed and stylish. Has a comfy pillow and has a content and warm kitty in it often. Second Armarkat purchase and very pleased second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Koba the Dread

product_meta.title: Aeromark International Armarkat Cave Shape Pet Cat Beds for Cats and Small Dogs-Waterproof and Skid-Free Base
product_meta.description: Size:18" L X 14" W X 12" H| Color:Sage GreenArmarkat is the leading brand of Aeromark Pet Product Company. Established in 1994, we are dedicated to the production of pet products such as Cat Trees and Pet Beds using large-scale production practices and were awarded TUV Environmental Quality Control test Certificate. With 14-year of experience in pet product design and production, Armarkat branded pet products are an industry recognized name known for quality and style.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 18-inch L by 14-inch W by 12-inch H
Faux Suede and Faux Fur with waterproof and skid-free base
Filled with extra thick 100-percent poly fill for maximum comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
